data.name: Wedgie Simulator Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Wedgie Simulator Demo!
A demo for a sandbox game about giving your mannequin a wedgie.


  • 3 scenes to choose from.
  • 16 characters; 8 templates, 8 samples.
  • Really fun and quirky wedgie physics!
  • Animate your scenes and pose your characters.
  • Screenshot your scenes.
  • Variety of music to choose from.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to Wedgie Simulator Demo!
A demo for a sandbox game about giving your mannequin a wedgie.


  • 3 scenes to choose from.
  • 16 characters; 8 templates, 8 samples.
  • Really fun and quirky wedgie physics!
  • Animate your scenes and pose your characters.
  • Screenshot your scenes.
  • Variety of music to choose from.
data.short_description: A new and intuitive simulator game where you can give people wedgies in several different angles, poses, and animations. You can create memes out of screenshots, or even TV shows via animation sequences to upload on your YouTube channel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM5 Compliant Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i7
  • Graphics: DXR Compliant Card (NVIDIA RTX 2060, similar or better)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
